column3: Go to the admin applications search page at /admin/applications
Apply a restriction to your search to give just a few search results (e.g. Application Status -> Revisions Required)
Select "Add a note" from the "Bulk Edit Records" box

column4: A text area appears asking you to "Type note here"

column3: Enter some note text into the textarea

column4: A message banner appears which tells you your request has be queued

column3: Click on the link provided to see the background job that was created

column4: The field suggestion_bulk_edit__note contains the note text you provided
The fields suggestion_bulk_edit__editor_group and suggestion_bulk_edit__application_status are empty
The Submit button is inactive again
